Reviews.Title: amazing
Reviews.Author: Braxton Todd
Reviews.Content: everything i knew it would be. very awesome.I would not want to buy another gaming laptop from anyone elseAsus is the best brand out there for all your gaming needs and eve non-gaming needs.amazon shipped in 24 hours tahnks to prime , and everthing showed up in good condition

Reviews.Title: Love it!!!!
Reviews.Author: backereater
Reviews.Content: I have owned this laptop for 6 months now.  It has exceeded all my expectations.  I upgraded the Ram to 16G and upgraded the hard drive to a solid state.  I bought this to game while traveling.  I am so glad I did not get the 17".  This is big enough and heavy enough for plane travel.  I have been able to use it for all my applications and to be honest, I have not booted up my desktop in over a month.  This is by far the best laptop I have owned.  I am so happy with the decision I made to purchase this laptop.  zero problems so far. The charging brick is big and bulky in my bag, but it is so worth it for the power that I have.

Reviews.Title: Have it 4 months and it has given me several problems.
Reviews.Author: Gabriel
Reviews.Content: At first it was wonderful. It is really heavy and big but that's to expect. after two month, a week before my thesis was due, the computer turned off. it didnt work for about a month and I was ready to return it. Then it worked again. Since it has given me audio, video and rack pad driver issues. I regret buying this computer and next time I will spend some more and buy an alienware.

Reviews.Title: Annndddd I'm Spent....
Reviews.Author: Dono1338
Reviews.Content: 1 hour of use without power cable and I get low battery...then 5 minutes later it shuts off... I even thought it had a bad battery and RMAed it but same thing with new battery...

Reviews.Title: IT'S A LEMON... DON'T BUY ONE... G SERIES LAPTOP LINE HAS GONE TO HELL!
Reviews.Author: LiLmEgZ
Reviews.Content: I bought one of these from a local dealer in my area about 2 weeks ago and on January 22nd I powered it on from sleep mode and all the sudden the backlight keyboard would just dim on its very own and the machine would power off automatically (w/o any user interactions), this also occurred on January 27th, 2013 the same thing happened again as well. I returned it in order to get the N56VZ-RH71 from my local dealer. I think ASUS needs to check into this issue whereas I can't find any other people experiencing the same thing on this laptop.BTW I had the G55's predecessor laptop (the G53) and it turned out to be a lemon about 2 months later... not sure if that's going to tell you anything about how bad the G Series machines are from ASUS.To ASUS: PLEASE look into this and correct it with the next models of the G Series laptops!

Reviews.Title: Meh...
Reviews.Author: starfoxed64
Reviews.Content: I expected a lot more performance out of an 8.8 lbs $1200 laptop. I am either spoiled by my custom rig or people don't know what fast is. I personally think that the GTX 660M in this computer is SLOWWWW.... I only have a GTX560 in my desktop and it seems to run circles around this card. I know I know it is a mobile card but I expected a lot more from a computer with a battery life of only 2 hrs tops. I also am very disappointed with the speed of the processor. I ran prime95 and Super Pi and in both instances saw where the i7 was a bottleneck. Now I am sure it all comes down to the HDD but if I am paying $1200 I would prefer that I have even a 128GB SSD over a 7200rpm HDD. Anyways I returned it and I think I am going to put a $1500 upgrade into my desktop instead and wait till my Birthday to get a tablet or something.Peace be with the people who purchased this thing..

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel Core i7-3610M 2.4 GHz Processor
8 GB DDR3; Windows 8
500 GB 7200 rpm Hard Drive
15.6-Inch Full-HD 1080P LED Screen, Nvidia GTX 660M 2G GDDR5 Graphics
Windows 8
ProductInfo.Name: ASUS Republic of Gamers G55VW-DH71 15.6-Inch Laptop
